text: Ablekuma North Parliament Election: The implication of NDC's Ewurabena Aubynn's win.
translated: Zaben majalisar dokokin Arewacin Ablekuma: Sakamakon nasarar Ewurabena Aubynn na NDC.
backtranslated: North Ablekuma parliamentary election: The result of the victory of Euraben Aubynn of the NDC.

text: Asante Kotoko's game against Kwara United won't be a walkover – Sarfo Duku.
translated: Wasan Asante Kotoko da Kwara United ba zai zama tafiya ba  Sarfo Duku.
backtranslated: Asante Kotoko's match against Kwara United will not be a trip for Sarfo Duku.

text: At least 13 drown fleeing armed men in northwest Nigeria.
translated: Akalla mutane 13 sun mutu a lokacin da suke gudu daga arewa maso yammacin Najeriya.
backtranslated: At least 13 people died while fleeing northwestern Nigeria.

text: Kumawu MP urges Parliament to act on crisis in Ghana’s prisons.
translated: 'Yan majalisar Kumawu sun bukaci majalisar ta dauki mataki kan rikicin da ke cikin kurkuku a Ghana.
backtranslated: Kumawu MPs urged the Parliament to take action on the prison crisis in Ghana.

text: Diddy declines to testify, praises judge as sex trafficking trial nears end.
translated: Diddy ya ki bayar da shaida, ya yaba wa alƙali yayin da shari'ar cinikin jima'i ke gabatowa.
backtranslated: Diddy refused to testify, praising the judge as the sex trafficking trial drew to a close.

text: 'Asibolanga' and all the 2022 beef songs that took the internet by storm.
translated: 'Asibolanga' da kuma dukan waƙoƙin naman shanu na 2022 da suka mamaye intanet.
backtranslated: 'Asibolanga' and all the 2022 beef songs that dominated the internet.

text: 'Act now before the situation deteriorates' – NDC Spain branch tells Mahama amid rising 'insecurity’.
translated: "Ka yi aiki yanzu kafin halin da ake ciki ya tabarbare"  Sashen NDC Spain ta gaya wa Mahama a tsakiyar "rashin tsaro"
backtranslated: "Act now before the situation deteriorates" NDC Spain told Mahama amid "security unrest"

text: Was Jose Mourinho right?: Unpacking the lows of Dele Alli’s football career.
translated: Shin Jose Mourinho ya yi daidai?: Fitar da ƙananan matakan aikin kwallon kafa na Dele Alli.
backtranslated: Was Jose Mourinho right?: Dele Alli's low-level football career was cut short.

text: Rema's Calm Down falls off Billboard Hot 100 after setting new record.
translated: Rema ta Calm Down ta fadi daga Billboard Hot 100 bayan kafa sabon rikodin.
backtranslated: Calm Down's remake fell off the Billboard Hot 100 after setting a new record.

text: 'I have always wanted a girl' - Rihanna opens up on pressure of raising two sons.
translated: 'Ko da yaushe ina son yarinya' - Rihanna ta furta cewa tana bukatar ta yi renon 'ya'ya maza biyu.
backtranslated: 'I've always loved a girl' - Rihanna admits that she needs to raise two boys.

text: Adjusted level 2: Presido announce new restrictions for South Africa to contain Coronavirus.
translated: Adjusted level 2: Presido ta sanar da sabbin takunkumi ga Afirka ta Kudu don hana Coronavirus.
backtranslated: Adjusted level 2: Presido announces new restrictions on South Africa to prevent Coronavirus.

text: 'What kind of nonsense is that?' - Prophet descends on GRNMA.
translated: 'Wane irin wauta ne wannan?' - Annabi ya sauko a GRNMA.
backtranslated: 'What kind of foolishness is this?' - The prophet descends on GRNMA.

text: 2023 AFCON: Ivory Coast Cote coach slams Nigeria for being overly defensive.
translated: 2023 AFCON: Kocin Ivory Coast ya yi wa Najeriya ba'a saboda ta kasance mai tsaron gida.
backtranslated: 2023 AFCON: Ivory Coast coach scoffs Nigeria for being a goalkeeper.

text: DKB and DJ Slim lock horns online.
translated: DKB da DJ Slim sun kulle ƙahonin kan layi.
backtranslated: DKB and DJ Slim have locked the online horns.

text: Dr Apostle Amagashie warns men against popular lovemaking position, cites stroke risk.
translated: Dr. Apostle Amagashie ya gargadi maza game da halin da ake ciki na yin jima'i, ya ambaci hadarin bugun jini.
backtranslated: Dr. Apostle Amagashie warned men about the dangers of sex, mentioning the risk of stroke.

text: Police arrest alleged serial motorbike thief.
translated: 'Yan sanda sun kama wani mai satar babur.
backtranslated: A motorcycle thief was arrested by the police.

text: FIFA imposes transfer ban on Hearts of Oak over unsettled $150,000 debt.
translated: FIFA ta haramta canja wurin Hearts of Oak saboda bashin da ba a warware ba na dala 150,000.
backtranslated: FIFA banned the transfer of Hearts of Oak for an unsolved $150,000 debt.

text: 'Mickey Mouse' boxer toasts Cape Verde's first Olympic medal.
translated: 'Mickey Mouse' mai dambe ya yi wa Cape Verde ta farko na gasar Olympics.
backtranslated: The boxer 'Mickey Mouse' made his Olympic debut for Cape Verde.

text: APP leader reacts after court throws out injunction against Akwatia by-election.
translated: Shugaban APP ya yi martani bayan da kotu ta yanke hukunci kan zaben na Akwatia.
backtranslated: The APP president responded after the court ruled on the Akwatia election.

text: Igbo leader addresses land acquisition allegations, apologises to Ghanaians.
translated: Shugaban Igbo ya yi magana game da zargin mallakar ƙasa, ya nemi gafara ga Ghanawa.
backtranslated: The Igbo leader spoke out against the allegations of land ownership, apologizing to the Ghanaians.

text: Bukom Arena gets face-lift to host Basketball games.
translated: Bukom Arena ta samu damar daukar nauyin wasannin kwando.
backtranslated: Bukom Arena was able to host the basketball games.

text: Afenyo-Markin apologises to Prof Ayensu-Danquah over 'strangely, you get a ministerial appointment' comment.
translated: Afenyo-Markin ya nemi gafara ga Farfesa Ayensu-Danquah saboda 'a ban mamaki, kun sami nadin minista' tsokaci.
backtranslated: Afenyo-Markin apologized to Professor Ayensu-Danquah for the 'surprisingly, you have been appointed minister' comment.

text: Asawa National Open Championship slated for June 19.
translated: Asawa National Open Championship da aka shirya a ranar 19 ga Yuni.
backtranslated: The Asawa National Open Championship is scheduled for June 19.

text: LIVESTREAMED: Kwaku Dawuro presents The Movement in the Morning Political Show.
translated: Kwaku Dawuro ya gabatar da The Movement in the Morning Political Show.
backtranslated: Kwaku Dawuro presented The Movement in the Morning Political Show.

text: 'God willing, I will receive my Lamborghini; I have documents to prove it's mine’ - Shatta Wale.
translated: 'Idan Allah ya yarda, zan karɓi Lamborghini na; Ina da takardun da za su tabbatar da cewa nawa ne  - Shatta Wale.
backtranslated: 'If God wills, I will take my Lamborghini; I have a certificate to prove that it is mine - Shatta Wale.

text: Helicopter Crash: Ibrahim Mahama offers to clear the debts of Dr Murtala, Alhaji Muniru.
translated: Hadarin jirgin sama: Ibrahim Mahama ya ba da damar kwantar da bashin Dr Murtala, Alhaji Muniru.
backtranslated: Airplane crash: Ibrahim Mahama has allowed the debt of Dr Murtala, Alhaji Muniru to be paid off.

text: Tennis legend Rafael Nadal to retire in November.
translated: Sanannen dan wasan tennis Rafael Nadal zai yi ritaya a watan Nuwamba.
backtranslated: Renowned tennis player Rafael Nadal will retire in November.

text: Enforce maternity-friendly workplace policies - Samuel Atidzah.
translated: Ka bi ƙa'idodin da ke taimaka wa iyaye su yi aiki da juna biyu.
backtranslated: Follow the principles that help parents to work together.

text: GEC Open returns to Ghana.
translated: GEC Open ta koma Ghana.
backtranslated: GEC Open returned to Ghana.

text: 'From dawn raid to helping with investigation to arraignment' - Azar calls out IGP over arrest of NPP activist.
translated: 'Daga safiya zuwa taimakawa da bincike zuwa gabatar da kara' - Azar ya kira IGP kan kama mai aikin NPP.
backtranslated: 'From morning to help and investigation to prosecution' - Azar called IGP on arrest of the NPP operator.

text: Home-based Ghana players seek more opportunities after good outing against South Africa.
translated: 'Yan wasan Ghana da ke gida suna neman karin dama bayan wasan da suka yi da Afirka ta Kudu.
backtranslated: Ghanaian players at home are looking for more opportunities after the match against South Africa.

text: Akwatia By-Election: We cannot be intimidated - NPP’s Haruna Mohammed.
translated: Zabe ta Akwatia: Ba za a iya tsoratar da mu ba - Haruna Mohammed na NPP.
backtranslated: Elections in Akwatia: We cannot be intimidated - Haruna Mohammed of NPP.

text: Some top Ghanaian musicians who ditched secular music for ministry.
translated: Wasu manyan mawaƙa na ƙasar Gana sun daina yin wa'azi don su yi wa'azi.
backtranslated: Some prominent Ghanaian musicians have given up preaching to preach.

text: Joseph Awinongya Jr emerges as number 1 boxer in the USA in top 6 u-20 amateur boxers.
translated: Joseph Awinongya Jr ya fito a matsayin mai dambe na 1 a Amurka a cikin manyan 'yan dambe masu son yin wasan U-20.
backtranslated: Joseph Awinongya Jr. emerged as the No. 1 U.S. boxer among the top U-20 amateur boxers.

text: Amenfi Central set for major road overhaul.
translated: An shirya cibiyar amenfi don gyara babbar hanya.
backtranslated: The amenfi center was set up to repair the highway.

text: Bui Power nets $64.
translated: Ƙarƙashin wutar lantarki na Bui $64.
backtranslated: The electricity bill for Bui is $64.

text: GCTU warns against defamatory publications, threatens legal action.
translated: GCTU ta yi gargadin kada a wallafa littattafai masu ɓata suna, tana barazanar daukar mataki a kotu.
backtranslated: The GCTU warned against publishing defamatory publications, threatening to sue.

text: American porn star Nasir sends message to Shugatiti as ‘orgasm’ challenge delays.
translated: Tauraruwar batsa ta Amurka Nasir ta aikawa Shugatiti sako a matsayin mai kalubalantar jinkirin yin jima'i.
backtranslated: American porn star Nasir sent a message to Shugatiti as a challenger to delayed sex.

text: I won 'contentious' unannounced 2019 VGMA Artiste of the Year Award - Stonebwoy claims.
translated: Na lashe kyautar 'yan wasa' ta 2019 ta VGMA ta shekarar da ba a sanar ba - Stonebwoy ya ce.
backtranslated: I won the 2019 VGMA Athletes' Award for the unannounced year - Stonebwoy said.

text: Helicopter Crash: 'You have not won; Christ has' – Wife of Sergeant Mensah shames death.
translated: Helicopter Crash: 'Ba ka yi nasara ba; Kristi ya yi'  Matar Sgt. Mensah ta kunyata mutuwa.
backtranslated: Helicopter Crash: 'You have not won; Christ has done it' The wife of Sergeant Mensah has embarrassed death.

text: 'He took me in and mentored me' - Ofori Amponsah delivers a heartfelt tribute to Daddy Lumba.
translated: 'Ya karɓe ni kuma ya koya mini' - Ofori Amponsah ya ba da ladabi mai kyau ga Daddy Lumba.
backtranslated: 'He took me in and taught me' - Ofori Amponsah showed good respect for Daddy Lumba.

text: 'How can I enter a house with familiar spirits' - Appiah Danquah reacts to NPP's amnesty for members.
translated: 'Yaya zan shiga gidan da akwai ruhohi da suka saba da ni?' - Appiah Danquah ya amsa ga fansar da NPP ta yi wa 'yan'uwa.
backtranslated: 'How can I enter a house where ghosts are familiar to me?' - Appiah Danquah responds to the ransom offered by NPP to the brothers.

text: High cholesterol can cause black toes and feet – Health expert.
translated: Ƙarfin cholesterol zai iya sa ƙafafunka da yatsunsu su yi baƙar fata  Masanin kiwon lafiya.
backtranslated: High cholesterol can cause your feet and fingers to turn black.

text: Rev.
translated: Mai Wa'azi
backtranslated: The Preacher

text: Ato Forson backs calls for fair deal on Africa's $1.
translated: Ato Forson ya goyi bayan kiran da ake yi na yin adalci a kan dala 1 na Afirka.
backtranslated: Ato Forson supported the call for justice on the African dollar.

text: Homowo: Nii Okanta Ankrah II calls for unity, peace and teamwork.
translated: Nii Okanta Ankrah II na kira ga hadin kai, zaman lafiya da aiki tare.
backtranslated: Nii Okanta Ankrah II called for cooperation, peace and cooperation.

text: NPP would have still punished Akua Afriyie if she had won – Nana Akomea.
translated: NPP za ta ci gaba da hukunta Akua Afriyie idan ta lashe  Nana Akomea.
backtranslated: NPP will continue to punish Akua Afriyie if she wins Nana Akomea.

text: A producer told me ‘Agya W’ahwe Me So’ was a terrible song with a horrible video – Rose Adjei.
translated: Wani mai samarwa ya gaya mani cewa "Agya Wahwe Me So" waƙa ce mai ban tsoro tare da bidiyo mai ban tsoro "Rose Adjei".
backtranslated: A producer told me that "Agya Wahwe Me So" was a scary song with a scary video "Rose Adjei".

text: NDC grassroots demand answers over helicopter crash, suspect foul play.
translated: Ƙungiyoyin NDC suna neman amsoshi game da hatsarin jirgin sama, zargin aikata laifi.
backtranslated: NDC groups are seeking answers about the plane crash, allegations of crime.

text: Key takeaways from EOCO's statement on Shatta Wale's Lamborghini case.
translated: Abubuwan da suka fi muhimmanci daga bayanin EOCO game da shari'ar Lamborghini ta Shatta Wale.
backtranslated: Highlights from the EOCO commentary on the Lamborghini case by Shatta Wale.

text: FDA intercepts GH¢11.
translated: FDA ta kama GH¢11.
backtranslated: The FDA has seized GH¢11.

text: Editorial by Ghanaian Times: Resolve outstanding issues to stem chaos!!.
translated: Editorial na Ghanaian Times: Warware batutuwan da ba a bayyana ba don kawo karshen rikici!!.
backtranslated: Editorial of the Ghanaian Times: Solving unspoken issues to end the conflict!!.

text: Sharp rise in fire injuries and deaths in first half of 2025 by 33%  – GNFS.
translated: Ƙaruwar yawan raunuka da mutuwar wuta a farkon rabin shekarar 2025 da kashi 33%  GNFS.
backtranslated: Increase in the number of injuries and deaths from fire in the first half of 2025 by 33% GNFS.

text: Why we signed Mohammed Kudus – Tottenham coach Thomas Frank explains.
translated: Dalilin da yasa muka sanya hannu kan Mohammed Kudus  Kocin Tottenham Thomas Frank ya bayyana.
backtranslated: The reason why we signed Mohammed Kudus Tottenham coach Thomas Frank has explained.

text: 'I love women if you don't understand, go to hell' - Old video of Kofi Jumah resurfaces.
translated: 'Ina son mata idan ba ku fahimta ba, ku tafi jahannama' - Tsohon bidiyon Kofi Jumah ya sake bayyana.
backtranslated: 'I like women if you don't understand, go to hell' - Back to the old Kofi Jumah video.

text: Islamic Banking: A financial game changer for all Ghanaians, not just Muslims.
translated: Bankin Musulunci: Wani canji na kudi ga dukkan 'yan Ghana, ba Musulmi kawai ba.
backtranslated: Islamic Bank: A financial change for all Ghanaians, not just Muslims.

text: Screen-Addiction Among Children: A note to parents.
translated: Yara Suna Da Sha'awar Nuna Labarai: Wani rubutu ga iyaye.
backtranslated: Children Have a Fun Story: A letter to parents.

text: Why Fatawu Issahaku was not called up by Otto Addo – GFA explains.
translated: Dalilin da yasa Otto Addo bai kira Fatawu Issahaku ba  GFA ta bayyana.
backtranslated: The GFA explains why Otto Addo did not call Fatawu Issahaku.

text: Agradaa’s parents slam brother for locking out Angel Asiamah from property.
translated: Iyayen Agradaa sun yi wa ɗan'uwansa bulala saboda ya toshe Angel Asiamah daga dukiya.
backtranslated: Agradaa's parents beat his brother up for blocking Angel Asiamah from possessions.

text: Ablekuma North Rerun: Ayawaso North MP reacts to alleged journalist assault.
translated: Ablekuma North Rerun: 'Yan majalisar Ayawaso North sun mayar da martani kan zargin da ake yi wa 'yan jarida.
backtranslated: Ablekuma North Rerun: Members of the Ayawaso North Parliament responded to the allegations against the media.

text: Ghana Armwrestling sends goodwill message to BECE, WASSCE candidates.
translated: Ghana Armwrestling ta aika da sako na kyakkyawar niyya ga BECE, 'yan takarar WASSCE.
backtranslated: Ghana Armwrestling has sent a message of goodwill to BECE, the WASSCE candidates.

text: Military officer’s wife begins attempt to break GWR for Longest Reading Aloud Marathon.
translated: Matar jami'in soji ta fara kokarin karya GWR don Marathon mafi tsawo na Karatu.
backtranslated: The wife of a military officer began attempting to break the GWR for the longest Reading Marathon.

text: Sammy Flex speaks after reassignment in Shatta Wale’s management.
translated: Sammy Flex ya yi magana bayan an sake sanya shi a cikin Shatta Wales management.
backtranslated: Sammy Flex spoke after being re-appointed to the Shatta Wales management.

text: Ghanaians shocked by death of President Mills.
translated: 'Yan kasar Ghana sun yi mamaki da mutuwar Shugaba Mills.
backtranslated: The death of President Mills shocked the people of Ghana.

text: National Delegates Conference: NPP NEC set to reject petition from Akufo-Addo, Kufuor.
translated: Taron Wakilan Kasa: NPP NEC ta shirya ta ƙi takardar neman izini daga Akufo-Addo, Kufuor.
backtranslated: National Representatives Meeting: NPP NEC is preparing to reject the application from Akufo-Addo, Kufuor.

text: Ghanaians must see the lessons we have learned - Dr Bawumia.
translated: Dole ne 'yan kasar Ghana su ga darussan da muka koya - Dr Bawumia.
backtranslated: The Ghanaians must see the lessons we learned - Dr Bawumia.

text: One dead in fire outbreak at uncompleted fuel station near Ejura.
translated: Daya ya mutu a cikin fashewar wuta a wani tashar mai kusa da Ejura.
backtranslated: One died in a fire at a station near Ejura.

text: 'Rubbish, on which road?' – Nigeria’s Formula 1 hosting bid sparks backlash on social media.
translated: "Rubbish, a wace hanya?"  Najeriya  Formula 1 hosting tayin ya jawo martani a kan kafofin watsa labarun.
backtranslated: "Rubbish, in what way?" Nigeria's Formula 1 hosting offer drew a response on social media.

text: 'My life changed after the accident' - McBrown speaks after arm surgery.
translated: 'Halin na ya canja bayan hatsarin.' - McBrown ya yi magana bayan an yi masa tiyata a hannu.
backtranslated: 'My attitude changed after the accident.' - McBrown, after his hand was operated on.

text: Democracy Cup: Deputy EC boss calls for participation in curtain-raiser fixtures.
translated: Kofin Demokradiyya: Mataimakin shugaban hukumar ya bukaci shiga cikin wasanni na tayar da labule.
backtranslated: The Democratic Cup: The vice president of the commission is required to participate in curtain raising sports.

text: FULL LIST: NPP approves 54 motions at 2025 Delegates Conference.
translated: Cikakken Jerin: NPP ta amince da shawarwari 54 a taron wakilan 2025.
backtranslated: Full List: NPP approved 54 resolutions at the 2025 delegation meeting.

text: Four times Afia Schwar has been embroiled in legal battles.
translated: Sau hudu Afia Schwar ta shiga cikin rikice-rikice na shari'a.
backtranslated: Four times Afia Schwar was involved in legal disputes.

text: LIVESTREAMED: Parliament debates Ablekuma North rerun violence.
translated: LIFESTREAMED: Majalisar ta yi muhawara a kan sake fara tashin hankali a Ablekuma Arewa.
backtranslated: LIFESTREAMED: The Assembly debates on the resumption of violence in North Ablekuma.

text: Appau-Klu denies allegations of land encroachment, abuse of power.
translated: Appau-Klu ya musanta zargin da ake yi na cin zarafin ƙasa, cin zarafin iko.
backtranslated: Appau-Klu denies the allegations of abuse of land, abuse of power.

text: Spotlight on Lumba's first 'Yee Ye Aka Akwantuom' album.
translated: Haske a kan Lumba ta farko 'Yee Ye Aka Akwantuom' album.
backtranslated: Light on Lumba's first 'Yee Ye Aka Akwantuom' album.

text: KIA begins enforcing reintroduced COVID-19 measures.
translated: KIA ta fara aiwatar da matakan COVID-19 da aka sake gabatar.
backtranslated: KIA has started implementing the re-introduced COVID-19 measures.

text: BoG puts digital credit services under regulation to boost financial inclusion.
translated: BoG ta sanya ayyukan bashi na dijital a ƙarƙashin tsari don haɓaka hada-hadar kuɗi.
backtranslated: BoG has put digital credit services under the framework to promote financial inclusion.

text: Fatau Dauda confident of Black Stars wins against Chad and Mali.
translated: Fatau Dauda ya tabbata cewa Black Stars za ta yi nasara a kan Chadi da Mali.
backtranslated: David was confident that the Black Stars would defeat Chad and Mali.

text: 'I am committed to continue the legacy of late Dr Murtala Mohammed' – Princess Naama.
translated: 'Na himmatu wajen ci gaba da gadon marigayi Dr. Murtala Mohammed'  Yarima Naama.
backtranslated: 'I am committed to carrying on the legacy of the late Dr. Murtala Mohammed' Prince Naama.

text: Watch as M.
translated: Ka lura da M.
backtranslated: Consider the example of M.

text: First cholera cases confirmed across three districts in the Ashanti Region.
translated: An tabbatar da kamuwa da cutar kwalara ta farko a gundumomi uku a yankin Ashanti.
backtranslated: The first case of cholera has been confirmed in three districts in the Ashanti region.

text: GH¢20m Defamation Suit: Empress Gifty's lawyer confirms Agradaa seeks case transfer.
translated: GH¢20m Laifin lalata: Lauyan Empress Gifty ya tabbatar Agradaa na neman canja wurin shari'ar.
backtranslated: GH¢20m Crime of adultery: Empress Gifty's lawyer confirmed Agradaa's request for a transfer of the case.

text: Mohammed Kudus shines with assist on Tottenham debut in Reading win.
translated: Mohammed Kudus ya yi haskakawa tare da taimako a wasan farko na Tottenham a cin nasarar Reading.
backtranslated: Mohammed Kudus came on as a substitute in Tottenham's first match in a win over Reading.

text: Read full details of official brochure on 8 fallen heroes from tragic August 6 helicopter crash.
translated: Ka karanta cikakken bayani game da littafin nan na hukuma game da jarumawa takwas da suka mutu a hatsarin jirgin sama mai saukar ungulu na ranar 6 ga Agusta.
backtranslated: Read more about the official account of eight heroes who died in a helicopter crash on August 6.

text: Kojo Barnni beats Torgah on sudden death to win 9th edition of Gold Fields PGA Championship.
translated: Kojo Barnni ya doke Torgah a mutuwar kwatsam don lashe gasar cin kofin PGA ta Gold Fields ta 9th.
backtranslated: Kojo Barnni defeated Torgah in an unexpected death to win his 9th PGA Gold Fields Championship.

text: 'He has taken all my happiness away' – Daddy Lumba's sister cries.
translated: 'Ya ɗauke mini farin ciki' 'Yar Daddy Lumba ta yi kuka.
backtranslated: "It took me away from joy", Father Lumba's daughter cried.

text: 'Nowhere does the law empower you to judge professorial titles' – Barker-Vormawor to GTEC.
translated: 'Babu inda doka ta ba ka ikon yin hukunci da lakabi na furofesoshi'  Barker-Vormawor zuwa GTEC.
backtranslated: 'Nowhere does the law give you the right to judge the title of professors' Barker-Vormawor to GTEC.

text: 'I love Stonebwoy; his talent is beyond the shores of Ghana' - Video of late Murtala resurfaces.
translated: 'Ina son Stonebwoy; basirarsa ta wuce ga tekun Ghana' - Bidiyon marigayi Murtala ya sake bayyana.
backtranslated: 'I love Stonebwoy; his talent has gone to the coast of Ghana' - Murtala's video reappears.

text: Trump says 11 killed in US strike on drug-carrying vessel from Venezuela.
translated: Trump ya ce mutane 11 ne aka kashe a harin da Amurka ta kai kan jirgin da ke dauke da miyagun kwayoyi daga Venezuela.
backtranslated: Trump said 11 people were killed in the US attack on a drug-laden vessel from Venezuela.

text: Paul Adom-Otchere ordered to appear before Special Prosecutor over GACL audit deal.
translated: Paul Adom-Otchere ya ba da umarnin ya bayyana a gaban Mai Shari'a ta Musamman game da yarjejeniyar duba GACL.
backtranslated: Paul Adom-Otchere has ordered to appear before the Special Counsel regarding the GACL review agreement.

text: Artistes who have sampled Daddy Lumba’s classic songs.
translated: Masu fasaha da suka yi samfurin waƙoƙin Daddy Lumba.
backtranslated: Artists who made a sample of Daddy Lumba's songs.

text: Known NPP sympathizer like GBA pres shouldn’t be calling for Torkornoo to be reinstated — Kpebu.
translated: Sanannen mai goyon bayan NPP kamar GBA Pres bai kamata ya bukaci a mayar da Torkornoo ba  Kpebu.
backtranslated: A well-known NPP supporter like GBA Pres should not have demanded the return of Torkornoo to Kpebu.

text: Party stalwarts should act responsibly at polling stations – Prof Gyampo.
translated: Ya kamata 'yan jam'iyyar su yi aiki da alhaki a wuraren zabe  Farfesa Gyampo.
backtranslated: The party members should act responsibly in the elections for Professor Gyampo.

text: National Cathedral audit uncovers massive financial irregularities – Kwakye Ofosu details.
translated: Binciken babban cocin ya gano manyan rashin daidaito na kudi  Kwakye Ofosu bayanai.
backtranslated: An investigation of the cathedral revealed major financial irregularities.

text: How I convinced Omane Boamah to quit NPP for NDC – Ato Ahwoi.
translated: Yadda na rinjayi Omane Boamah ya bar NPP don NDC  Ato Ahwoi.
backtranslated: How I persuaded Omane Boamah to leave the NPP for NDC Ato Ahwoi.

text: WAFCON 2024: Ghana ready to battle for bronze – Stella Nyamekye.
translated: WAFCON 2024: Ghana a shirye take ta yi yaƙi don tagulla  Stella Nyamekye.
backtranslated: WAFON 2024: Ghana is ready to fight for the Stella Nyamekye bronze.

text: Sack all appointees who have left their jobs to campaign to replace you – Kwesi Pratt to Mahama.
translated: Ka kori duk wanda ya bar aikinsa don ya yi yakin neman zaben ya maye gurbin ka Kwesi Pratt zuwa Mahama.
backtranslated: Fired anyone who left his job to campaign and replaced you Kwesi Pratt to Mahama.

text: Prof Mills would be outraged with level of galamsey destruction, toxic politics – Charlotte Osei.
translated: Farfesa Mills zai yi fushi da matakin halakar galamsey, siyasa mai guba  Charlotte Osei.
backtranslated: Professor Mills would be furious at the action of the destruction of galamsey, the poisonous politician Charlotte Osei.

text: Local government minister swears in new board members for ILGS, LUSPA.
translated: Ministan karamar hukumar ya rantsar da sabbin mambobin hukumar ILGS, LUSPA.
backtranslated: The Minister of Local Government sworn in the new members of ILGS, LUSPA.

text: Farmers to receive $5,040 per tonne of cocoa for 2025/2026 season.
translated: Manoma za su karɓi dala 5,040 a kowace tan na koko a kakar 2025/2026.
backtranslated: Farmers will receive $5,040 per ton of cocoa in the 2025/2026 season.

text: Obofour and Agradaa must settle their beef in court instead of social media – Onegod.
translated: Obofour da Agradaa dole ne su daidaita matsalarsu a kotu maimakon kafofin sada zumunta  Onegod.
backtranslated: Obofour and Agradaa had to settle their case in court instead of Onegod's social media.

text: There are over 100,000 people living with and spreading HIV without knowing it - AIDS Commission boss.
translated: Mutane fiye da 100,000 ne ke rayuwa da cutar HIV kuma suna yada ta ba tare da sanin hakan ba.
backtranslated: More than 100,000 people are living with HIV and are spreading it without even realizing it.

text: Use COVID-19 fund to strengthen health care, immunization financing — HFFG.
translated: Yi amfani da asusun COVID-19 don ƙarfafa kula da lafiya, tallafin rigakafi  HFFG.
backtranslated: Use COVID-19 funds to strengthen health care, immunization support HFFG.

text: 2022 most controversial celebrities.
translated: 2022 mafi yawan masu shahararrun masu ban mamaki.
backtranslated: 2022 most popular superheroes.

text: Awutu Senya East MCE kick-starts fix all potholes in Kasoa.
translated: Awutu Senya Gabas MCE kickstarts gyara duk rami a Kasoa.
backtranslated: Awutu Senya East MCE kickstarts repaired all the pit in Kasoa.

text: 'My house was attacked after I prophesied Mahama's win in 2024 Election' - Prophet Worlasi.
translated: 'An kai hari gidan na bayan na yi annabci cewa Mahama zai yi nasara a Zaben 2024' - Annabi Worlasi.
backtranslated: 'My house was attacked after I prophesied that Mahama would win the 2024 Election' - Prophet Worlasi.

text: 2019 Asante Akyem Marathon set for April 22.
translated: 2019 Asante Akyem Marathon an shirya don Afrilu 22.
backtranslated: The 2019 Asante Akyem Marathon is scheduled for April 22.

text: Daddy Lumba's one-week observation in jeopardy?.
translated: Daddy Lumba na mako guda yana cikin hadari?
backtranslated: Is Daddy Lumba in danger for a week?

text: Ghanaian artiste Kay9ice composes ‘Mind Games’ to celebrate Davido, Chioma.
translated: Mai zane-zane na Ghana Kay9ice ya rubuta Mind Games don bikin Davido, Chioma.
backtranslated: Ghanaian artist Kay9ice has written Mind Games for the festival of Davido, Chioma.

text: National Functional Sports League to hold two-day competition.
translated: Kungiyar Wasannin Wasanni ta Kasa za ta gudanar da gasar kwanaki biyu.
backtranslated: The National Athletic Association will host the two-day competition.

text: Father threatens legal action against popular SHS for alleged negligence.
translated: Mahaifin ya yi barazanar daukar mataki a kotu kan SHS mai suna SHS saboda zargin rashin kula.
backtranslated: The father threatened to take legal action against SHS on charges of negligence.

text: CID Director General sworn in as a board member of Small Arms Commission.
translated: Babban daraktan CID ya rantsar da kansa a matsayin memba na kwamitin Hukumar Kananan Makamai.
backtranslated: The Director-General of the CID has sworn in as a member of the Committee on Small Arms.

text: Is Daddy Lumba dead or alive? - What we know so far.
translated: Daddy Lumba ya mutu ko yana raye?
backtranslated: Is Daddy Lumba dead or alive?

text: Ghana urgently needs a pricing regulatory authority to stabilise the economy.
translated: Ghana tana bukatar wata hukuma mai kula da farashin gaggawa domin daidaita tattalin arzikin.
backtranslated: Ghana needs an emergency pricing agency to stabilize the economy.

text: Coronavirus: Africa needs US$285 billion to fight off pandemic impact - IMF.
translated: Coronavirus: Afirka na bukatar dala biliyan 285 domin yaki da tasirin annobar - IMF.
backtranslated: Coronavirus: Africa needs $285 billion to fight the effects of the pandemic - IMF.

text: Why NPP and NDC are responsible for the  poor state of sports - Dan Kwaku Yeboah explains.
translated: Dalilin da yasa NPP da NDC ke da alhakin rashin lafiyar wasanni - Dan Kwaku Yeboah ya bayyana.
backtranslated: The reason why NPP and NDC are responsible for sports health - Kwaku Yeboah's son explains.

text: 2 dead as police engage in a shootout with highway robbery gang.
translated: 2 sun mutu yayin da 'yan sanda suka shiga harbi da 'yan fashi a kan titin.
backtranslated: 2 were killed when police fired on the street.

text: I’m now focused on returning to athletics - Martha Bissah.
translated: Yanzu ina mai da hankali ne kan komawa wasan motsa jiki. Martha Bissah.
backtranslated: I now focus on returning to the gym.

text: Ghana's Abrefa wins medals at London Table Tennis Grand Prix.
translated: Abrefa na Ghana ya lashe lambobin yabo a gasar cin kofin London.
backtranslated: The Ghanaian referee won medals at the London Cup.

text: Woman flees from marriage after several death threats from husband.
translated: Wata mace ta gudu daga aure bayan da mijinta ya yi mata barazanar kisa.
backtranslated: A woman ran away from her husband after he threatened to kill her.

text: Pure FM studio burnt to ashes.
translated: Gidan rediyo na FM mai tsabta ya ƙone zuwa toka.
backtranslated: A clean FM radio station burned to the ground.

text: IET Ghana mourns victims of helicopter crash.
translated: IET Ghana ta yi makoki ga wadanda suka mutu a hatsarin jirgin sama.
backtranslated: IET Ghana mourns the loss of life in the plane crash.

text: Ablekuma North Violence: 'NDC reminds me of David killing Uriah for his wife' - Dr Okoe Boye.
translated: Ablekuma North Violence: 'NDC ta tunatar da ni cewa Dauda ya kashe Uriah don matarsa' - Dr Okoe Boye.
backtranslated: Ablekuma North Violence: 'NDC reminded me that David killed Uriah for his wife' - Dr Okoe Boye.

text: Any police officer sent to Akwatia by-election without a weapon is at risk – Okoe Boye warns.
translated: Duk wani jami'in 'yan sanda da aka aika zuwa zaben Akwatia ba tare da makami ba yana cikin hadari  Okoe Boye ya gargadi.
backtranslated: Any police officer sent to the Akwatia election without a weapon is in danger Okoe Boye warned.

text: Chelsea players 'brag' about teams they want to face ahead of Champions League draw.
translated: 'Yan wasan Chelsea suna 'boing' game da kungiyoyin da suke son fuskantar kafin wasan gasar zakarun Turai.
backtranslated: Chelsea players are 'boying' about the teams they want to face before the European Championship.

text: Safe Water Network commissions over $800,000 Asikuma Home Water Station.
translated: Cibiyar Kula da Ruwa Mai Amfani da Amfani ta Gudanar da $800,000 a tashar ruwa ta Asikuma.
backtranslated: The Center for Water Resources Management has managed $800,000 at the Asikuma port.

text: 'Thank you Ablekuma North, together we made history!' - Ewurabena Aubynn after rerun victory.
translated: 'Na gode Ablekuma North, mun yi tarihi tare!' - Ewurabena Aubynn bayan da ta sake yin nasara.
backtranslated: 'Thank you, Ablekuma North, we made history together!' - My sister Aubynn after she won again.

text: Kwabena Poku wins 7th Captain One Major championship.
translated: Kwabena Poku ya lashe gasar Kyaftin na 7 na Major One.
backtranslated: Pokbena Pokora won the 7th Major One Captain's Cup.

text: PDP zone 2027 presidential candidate to south, five key takeaways from critical NEC meeting.
translated: PDP zone 2027 takarar shugaban kasa zuwa kudu, biyar key takeaways daga muhimmanci NEC taro.
backtranslated: PDP zone 2027 presidential candidate to the south, five key takeaways from important NEC meeting.

text: Fugitive wanted over Australia police killings being helped, police say.
translated: An nemi mai tserewa a Australia saboda an taimaka wa 'yan sanda su kashe, 'yan sanda sun ce.
backtranslated: An Australian fugitive was sought because he had helped the police kill, police said.

text: Reks Brobby to serve on technical committee for 14th African Games.
translated: Reks Brobby zai yi aiki a kwamitin fasaha na wasannin Afirka na 14.
backtranslated: Reks Brobby will serve on the technical committee of the 14th African Games.

text: Watch when Usain Bolt showed how fast he is against regular, everyday people.
translated: Ka lura da lokacin da Usain Bolt ya nuna yadda yake da sauri a kan mutane na yau da kullum.
backtranslated: Note when Usain Bolt showed how fast he was on the average person.

text: Lifestyle: Tactics for successful career branding.
translated: Rayuwa: Dabaru don samun nasara a sana'ar kasuwanci.
backtranslated: Life: Strategies for success in business.

text: 'I was made for this' - Bawumia as he leads Africa’s digital agenda at Cambridge.
translated: 'An halicce ni don wannan' - Bawumia yayin da yake jagorantar tsarin dijital na Afirka a Cambridge.
backtranslated: 'I was created for this' - Bawumia as he led the African digital system at Cambridge.

text: Salaga-South MP distributes 650 bags of fertiliser to constituents to boost farming.
translated: Dan majalisar Salaga-South ya rarraba jakunkuna 650 na takin mai magani ga masu zabe don karfafa aikin gona.
backtranslated: The Salaga-South MP distributed 650 bags of fertilizer to the voters to encourage agriculture.

text: Speaker Bagbin ‘in ruthless pain’ over fatal helicopter crash.
translated: Mai magana da yawun Bagbin yana cikin matsanancin azaba saboda hatsarin jirgin sama mai saukar ungulu.
backtranslated: The spokesman for Bagbin was in deep pain from a helicopter crash.

text: Crackdown on Fake Titles: We must move from 'title worship' to performance - Prof Bokpin.
translated: Dole ne mu matsa daga 'bautar taken' zuwa wasan kwaikwayon - Farfesa Bokpin.
backtranslated: We had to move from 'title worship' to the theater - Professor Bokpin.

text: Paul Bongo releases 'This Party'.
translated: Paul Bongo ya saki "Wannan Jam'iyyar".
backtranslated: Paul Bongo released "This Party".

text: Year in Review: Greatest showbiz scandals of 2023.
translated: Shekara a cikin Review: Mafi girma showbiz zargi na 2023.
backtranslated: The year in Review: The highest showbiz criticism of 2023.

text: 'I spent over $15,000 on my TGMAs performance' - Fameye.
translated: 'Na kashe fiye da dala 15,000 a wasan kwaikwayon na na TGMA' - Fameye.
backtranslated: 'I spent over $15,000 on my TGMA show' - Fameye.

text: 2023 AFCON: Nigeria reach final after edging South Africa on penalties.
translated: 2023 AFCON: Najeriya ta kai karshe bayan ta doke Afirka ta Kudu a kan fansa.
backtranslated: 2023 AFCON: Nigeria reaches the final after beating South Africa on penalties.

text: Nkwanta North records first Mpox case - District Health Director.
translated: Nkwanta North ta rubuta labarin Mpox na farko - Daraktan Lafiya na Gundumar.
backtranslated: Nkwanta North wrote Mpox's first story - the District Health Director.

text: 'Calculated attempt to divide us' – Appiagyei slams move to replace Afenyo-Markin at ECOWAS Parliament.
translated: 'Yin kokarin raba mu'  Appiagyei ya yi watsi da matakin maye gurbin Afenyo-Markin a majalisar ECOWAS.
backtranslated: 'Trying to divide us' Appiagyei has rejected the move to replace Afenyo-Markin in the ECOWAS Council.

text: Ridge Hospital: One arrested in connection with assault on health workers.
translated: Asibitin Ridge: An kama daya da alaka da harin da aka kai wa ma'aikatan kiwon lafiya.
backtranslated: Ridge Hospital: One was arrested in connection with the attack on medical personnel.

text: R2Bees storm Accra Technical University on July 18 for WatsUp on campus.
translated: R2Bees ya mamaye Jami'ar Fasaha ta Accra a ranar 18 ga Yuli don WatsUp a harabar.
backtranslated: R2Bees invaded Accra University of Technology on 18 July for WatsUp on campus.

text: Bawku SHS shut down after the fatal shooting of a final-year student.
translated: An rufe makarantar sakandare ta Bawku bayan harbi na wani dalibi na shekara ta karshe.
backtranslated: Bawku's high school was closed after a senior student was shot.

text: Pharmaceutical distributor fined GH¢1.
translated: An yi wa mai rarraba magunguna tarar GH¢1.
backtranslated: The drug distributor was fined GH¢1.

text: How can Partey rape one woman three times? – Kankam Boadu questions charges.
translated: Ta yaya Partey zai iya yi wa mace fyade sau uku?
backtranslated: How could Partey rape a woman three times?

text: Editorial by Ghanaian Times: Tons of commendations for Appiatse’s rebirth.
translated: Editorial na Ghanaian Times: Tons na yabo ga sake haihuwar Appiatse.
backtranslated: Editorial of the Ghanaian Times: Tons of praise for the rebirth of Appiatse.

text: 'I was persecuted' - ACP Agordzo gives blow-by-blow account on alleged coup trial.
translated: "An tsananta mini" - ACP Agordzo ya ba da labarin da ya faru game da zargin da ake yi na juyin mulki.
backtranslated: "I was persecuted" - ACP Agordzo related an experience of the accusations of coup d'état.

text: Prof Ransford Gyampo reveals why he accepted Mahama's call to serve after several offers.
translated: Farfesa Ransford Gyampo ya bayyana dalilin da ya sa ya yarda da kiran Mahama ya yi hidima bayan da ya yi wasu tayi.
backtranslated: Professor Ransford Gyampo explains why he accepted Mahama's invitation to serve after he had had several abortions.

text: Bankrogya community isolated by floodwaters, cries for basic infrastructure.
translated: Al'ummar Bankrogya da ke cikin ruwa mai yawa sun yi kuka don samun kayan aikin da suka dace.
backtranslated: The Bankrogya people in the deep waters cried out for the right equipment.

text: Uganda in talks to import all its oil via Tanzania.
translated: Uganda tana tattaunawa don shigo da dukkan man fetur ta Tanzania.
backtranslated: Uganda is negotiating to import all of Tanzania's oil.

text: Movement for Change shuts down NPP comeback claims.
translated: Kungiyar Canji ta dakatar da yin ikirarin dawowar NPP.
backtranslated: The Change Group has stopped claiming the return of the NPP.

text: Frimpong-Manso Institute mourns victims of devastating helicopter crash.
translated: Cibiyar Frimpong-Manso ta yi makoki ga wadanda suka mutu sakamakon hatsarin jirgin sama mai saukar ungulu.
backtranslated: The Frimpong-Manso Center mourns the deaths of the helicopter crash.

text: You are sick if you have protruding stomach - Dr Dominic Nitiwul.
translated: Idan kana da ciki mai tsayi, kana rashin lafiya.
backtranslated: If you have a long pregnancy, you are sick.

text: Alhaji Grusah drops match fixing allegations claims against Dreams FC.
translated: Alhaji Grusah ya sauke wasan don gyara zargin da ake yi wa Dreams FC.
backtranslated: Alhaji Grusah downloaded the game to correct the allegations against Dreams FC.

text: Ghanaians urged to resolve disputes peacefully.
translated: An bukaci 'yan ƙasar Ghana su magance jayayya ta hanyar lumana.
backtranslated: Ghanaians were urged to resolve disputes peacefully.

text: Moslena Adu, Ahmed Abdul Samad star at 2024 Tebel All Ghana Badminton Championship.
translated: Moslena Adu, Ahmed Abdul Samad ta yi tauraruwa a gasar Badminton ta Tebel All Ghana ta 2024.
backtranslated: Moslena Adu, Ahmed Abdul Samad starred in the 2024 Tebel All Ghana Badminton competition.

text: Why was Kevin Taylor's arrest warrant not enforced?.
translated: Me ya sa ba a aiwatar da umurnin da Kevin Taylor ya bayar ba?
backtranslated: Why was Kevin Taylor's instruction not followed?

text: Rejected by their stepfather at 9, he and his twin turned to eating leftovers, sleeping in the cold.
translated: Mahaifinsa ya ƙi shi sa'ad da yake shekara tara, shi da tagwaye suka ci abinci da suka rage kuma suka yi barci a cikin sanyi.
backtranslated: When he was nine years old, his father rejected him, so he and his twin brothers ate the leftovers and slept in the cold.

text: Serve funeral guests according to their donations - Lower Axim Traditional Council directs.
translated: Ku yi wa baƙi jana'izar hidima bisa ga gudummawarsu - Ƙananan Axim na gargajiya na Majalisar umarni.
backtranslated: Serve the guests at the funeral according to their contributions - the traditional Axim of the Council order.

text: Ghanaian men do not know how to make love - Delkie claims.
translated: Delkie ya ce, mazaje a Ghana ba su san yadda za su yi soyayya ba.
backtranslated: Delkie says that in Ghana, men do not know how to make love.

text: COVID-19: Mass vaccination ahead of Christmas begins December 14-18 - GHS.
translated: COVID-19: Ana yin allurar rigakafin taro kafin Kirsimeti daga 14-18 ga Disamba - GHS.
backtranslated: COVID-19: Mass vaccination is available before Christmas from 14-18 December - GHS.

text: Accra Mayor pledges Hockey support.
translated: Magajin garin Accra ya yi alkawarin tallafawa hockey.
backtranslated: The mayor of Accra pledged to support hockey.

text: COVID-19: All set for second dose vaccination in Ashanti Region.
translated: COVID-19: An shirya duka don allurar rigakafi na biyu a Yankin Ashanti.
backtranslated: COVID-19: All are scheduled for second vaccination in Ashanti Region.

text: Peace Council condemns violence at Ablekuma North, calls for calm.
translated: Majalisar zaman lafiya ta yi Allah wadai da tashin hankali a Ablekuma ta Arewa, ta yi kira ga kwanciyar hankali.
backtranslated: The Peace Council condemned the violence in North Ablekuma, calling for peace.

text: Nigeria's Maduka Okoye banned two months for match fixing.
translated: An haramta Maduka Okoye ta Najeriya na tsawon watanni biyu saboda daidaita wasan.
backtranslated: Maduka Okoye of Nigeria was banned for two months for regulating the game.

text: EL calls for peace with DopeNation after years of misunderstanding.
translated: EL ta yi kira ga zaman lafiya da DopeNation bayan shekaru da yawa na rashin fahimta.
backtranslated: EL called for peace with DopeNation after years of misunderstanding.

text: Staff raise 'alarm' over deplorable state of Janga Technical School infrastructure.
translated: Ma'aikata sun yi ta "tashin hankali" game da halin da ake ciki na kayan aikin makarantar fasaha ta Janga.
backtranslated: The workers were "outraged" about the state of the equipment of the Janga art school.

text: Elders of Djetsorkope present newly installed chief to Osudoku Traditional Council.
translated: Dattawan Djetsorkope sun gabatar da sabon shugaban da aka nada a majalisar gargajiya ta Osudoku.
backtranslated: The elders of Djetsorkope have introduced a newly appointed president to the traditional Osudoku parliament.

text: We are aiming to win bronze medal against Senegal - Sudan coach Kwesi Appiah.
translated: Muna neman lashe lambar tagulla a kan kocin Senegal - Sudan Kwesi Appiah.
backtranslated: We are looking to win the bronze medal against Senegal coach - Sudan Kwesi Appiah.

text: Kudus, Semenyo make official EPL Team of the Week after impressive opening week.
translated: Kudus, Semenyo sun zama jami'in EPL Team na mako bayan mako na farko.
backtranslated: Kudus, Semenyo became the official EPL Team of the week after the first week.

text: Sofo Azorka should have been arrested by the police – Nana Boakye.
translated: Sofo Azorka ya kamata 'yan sanda su kama shi  Nana Boakye.
backtranslated: Sofo Azorka should have been arrested by the police Nana Boakye.

text: Throwback Thursday: Spotlight on Daasebre Dwamena.
translated: Tashin baya a ranar Alhamis: Haske a kan Daasebre Dwamena.
backtranslated: Backstage Thursday: Light on my dream.

text: 2022 In Review: Celebrity weddings that made waves.
translated: 2022 A cikin Review: Bikin aure na shahararrun da suka yi tawaye.
backtranslated: 2022 In Review: Wedding of the famous Rebels.

text: FLASHBACK: Watch as NDC member threatens, curses Hawa Koomson over 2024 election violence.
translated: FLASHBACK: Ka kalli yadda wani dan jam'iyyar NDC ya yi barazana, ya la'anci Hawa Koomson a kan tashin hankali a zaben 2024.
backtranslated: FLASHBACK: Watch how a NDC member threatened, denouncing Hawa Koomson for violence in the 2024 election.

text: Ballon D’Or 2025: Lamine Yamal, Doue & Michelle Agyemang lead nominees for best young player awards.
translated: Ballon DOr 2025: Lamine Yamal, Doue & Michelle Agyemang sun jagoranci masu neman kyautar mafi kyawun ɗan wasan matasa.
backtranslated: Ballon DOr 2025: Lamine Yamal, Doue & Michelle Agyemang lead the candidates for the award for best young player.

text: Why January is generally an economically difficult month.
translated: Me ya sa Janairu wata ne mai wuya a tattalin arziki?
backtranslated: Why was January a difficult economic month?

text: Meet DCOP Lydia Yaako Donkor, new Director-General of CID trailblazing law enforcement and legal advocacy.
translated: Ka sadu da DCOP Lydia Yaako Donkor, sabon darektan janar na CID wanda ke jagorantar aiwatar da doka da kuma kare doka.
backtranslated: Meet DCOP Lydia Yaako Donkor, the new director general of CID who is leading law enforcement and law enforcement.

text: It was a childish decision - Obiri Boahen slams NPP for disbanding vigilante groups.
translated: Wannan yanke shawara ce ta yara - Obiri Boahen ya yi wa NPP ba'a saboda rushe kungiyoyin masu kare hakkin mutane.
backtranslated: This was a childish decision - Obiri Boahen mocked the NPP for dismantling human rights groups.

text: Helicopter Crash: Ghana has lost a potential president in Omane Boamah – Ebo Whyte.
translated: Helicopter Crash: Ghana ta rasa wani shugaban kasa mai yiwuwa a Omane Boamah  Ebo Whyte.
backtranslated: Helicopter Crash: Ghana lost a possible president in Omane Boamah Ebo Whyte.

text: LIVESTREAMED: Kwaku Dawuro presents The Movement in the Morning Political Show.
translated: Kwaku Dawuro ya gabatar da The Movement in the Morning Political Show.
backtranslated: Kwaku Dawuro presented The Movement in the Morning Political Show.

text: I don't mind if Ghanaians want to vote a president for more than two terms – Freddie Blay.
translated: Ba na damuwa idan 'yan Ghanawa suna son su zabe shugaban kasa fiye da na biyu  Freddie Blay.
backtranslated: I don't care if Ghanaians are more willing to vote for president than second-in-command Freddie Blay.

text: Students Loan Trust Fund warns against unauthorised use of Logo on billboards.
translated: Asusun Kasuwancin Kasuwancin Dalibai ya yi gargadi game da amfani da Logo ba tare da izini ba a kan allon talla.
backtranslated: The Student Marketing Fund warns against using the Logo without permission on billboards.

text: South African influencer apologises over viral Russian job videos.
translated: Wani mai tasiri a Afirka ta Kudu ya nemi gafara saboda bidiyo na aikin Rasha da ya yi yawa.
backtranslated: An influencer in South Africa apologized for the excessive amount of Russian-language videos.

text: Full list of award winners at the 2023 AFCON.
translated: Cikakken jerin masu cin kyautar a gasar cin kofin kwallon kafa ta 2023 .
backtranslated: Full list of winners in the 2023 FIFA World Cup.

text: Daddy Lumba's 'Yentie Obiaa' helped me through money ritual allegations - LilWin.
translated: 'Yentie Obiaa' na Daddy Lumba ya taimaka min wajen magance zargin kudi na al'ada - LilWin.
backtranslated: Daddy Lumba's 'Yentie Obiaa' helped me deal with the usual financial charges - LilWin.

text: Meet Benedicta Kwartemaa: The OKESS sprinting princess.
translated: Ka sadu da Benedicta Kwartemaa: Yarinyar da ke yin tsere ta OKESS.
backtranslated: Meet Benedicta Kwartemaa: The girl who runs the OKESS.

text: Ex-convict teacher jailed 48 years for defiling 7-year-old girl.
translated: Tsohon malamin da aka yanke masa hukuncin daurin shekaru 48 a kurkuku saboda lalata yarinya 'yar shekara 7.
backtranslated: A former teacher who was sentenced to 48 years in prison for molesting a 7-year-old girl.

text: Highlights of Dr Bawumia's electrifying speech after filing his nomination.
translated: Abubuwan da suka fi muhimmanci a jawabin Dr. Bawumia bayan ya gabatar da takardunsa.
backtranslated: Highlights of Dr. Bawumia's speech after presenting his papers.

text: Hearts of Oak coach Didi Dramani stresses determination to bring ‘sustainability and success' to the club.
translated: Kocin Zuciyar Oak Didi Dramani ya jaddada ƙudurin kawo "tsara da nasara" ga kulob din.
backtranslated: Oak's Head Coach Didi Dramani stressed his determination to bring "management and success" to the club.

text: Events that shocked the nation in 2020.
translated: Abubuwan da suka faru da suka girgiza al'ummar kasar a shekarar 2020.
backtranslated: The events that shook the nation in 2020.

text: Sports minister halts unlawful development of parts of Borteyman sports complex.
translated: Ministan wasanni ya dakatar da ci gaban da ba bisa ka'ida ba na sassan cibiyar wasanni ta Borteyman.
backtranslated: The sports minister halted the illegal development of the Borteyman sports centre.

text: Exiled Across the Ocean: How the British banished Agyemang Prempeh I and his chiefs to Seychelles.
translated: An kai su gudun hijira a fadin Tekun: Yadda Britaniyawa suka kai Agyemang Prempeh I da shugabanninsa zuwa Seychelles.
backtranslated: Exiled across the Sea: How the British brought Agyemang Prempeh I and his leaders to the Seychelles.

text: Health Minister lays Ghana Medical Trust Fund Bill before Parliament.
translated: Ministan lafiya ya gabatar da Dokar Asusun Kula da Lafiya na Ghana a gaban majalisar.
backtranslated: The Minister of Health introduced the Ghana Health Insurance Bill to the Parliament.

text: Ghanaians can travel to these 4 countries without visas after Parliament's ratification.
translated: 'Yan kasar Ghana za su iya tafiya zuwa wadannan kasashe 4 ba tare da biza ba bayan an amince da su a majalisar.
backtranslated: Ghanaian citizens can travel to these four countries without a visa after being approved by the parliament.

text: Watch Joseph Paintsil’s goal in LA Galaxy’s 4-0 win over Santos Laguna.
translated: Ka kalli kwallo da Joseph Paintsil ya zira a wasan da LA Galaxy ta yi 4-0 a kan Santos Laguna.
backtranslated: Look at the goal scored by Joseph Paintsil in the 4-0 loss to LA Galaxy over Santos Laguna.
